title: Rihanna simply shines in a glittering gold blouse with matching slacks for dinner in Santa Monica
text:
She reunited with her ex-boyfriend to ring in another year around the sun.

But Rihanna made sure to make a pit stop at her favorite Italian restaurant in Santa Monica on Wednesday night before celebrating Drake's 33rd birthday.

The 31-year-old makeup mogul simply shined in a sparkling gold ensemble for dinner at celebrity hotspot Giorgio Baldi.

Golden girl: Rihanna made sure to make a pit stop at her favorite Italian restaurant in Santa Monica on Wednesday night before celebrating Drake's 33rd birthday

Rihanna hurried into the Italian joint wearing a shimmering gold turtleneck top with long sleeves.

Her famous figure was on display in a pair of matching slacks which were hemmed just below her ankles to reveal gilded stilettos and a perfect pedicure.

Adding another element of her power color, the Umbrella songstress carried a sparkling bolero jacket and carried a white purse in one hand.

Perfection: The 31-year-old makeup mogul simply shined in a sparkling gold ensemble for dinner at celebrity hotspot Giorgio Baldi

She wore her luscious brown hair in natural curls and accessorized with a gold statement ring and silver hoop earrings.

The Barbados-born beauty was spotted enjoying Drake's early birthday celebrations at Poppy nightclub in Hollywood earlier this week.

Lyrica Anderson grabbed a few snaps with the We Found Love hitmaker before the pair danced the night away.

Friends forever: The Barbados-born beauty was spotted enjoying Drake's early birthday celebrations at Poppy nightclub in Hollywood earlier this week

Pals: Lyrica Anderson grabbed a few snaps with the We Found Love hitmaker before the pair danced the night away

Forbes recently revealed that Rihanna — who's real name is Robyn Rihanna Fenty — is the richest female musical artist.

The Diamonds singer's $600 million net worth has eclipsed the fortunes earned by her peers Beyonce, Madonna and Celine Dion, according to the publication.

In addition to her latest fashion ventures, Rihanna dipped into the world of cosmetics in 2017 with Fenty Beauty, a company which accrued nearly $570million in revenue in 2018.
description: The 31-year-old makeup mogul simply shined in a sparkling gold ensemble for dinner at celebrity hotspot Giorgio Baldi in Santa Monica on Wednesday night.
